text: Propane is an organic compound with the chemical formula . It is an alkane with three carbon atoms. It is used in fuels. It begins to burn very quickly. Its melting temperature is −187.7 °C; its boiling temperature is −42 °C; its density is 1.83 g/l. Propane is extracted from natural gasoline or from petroleum. ==Sources== 3
title: Propane
